nodes.text: Queen of the Core Network was a HoloNet news network active during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Two of its employees were the human journalist Tracene Kane and the Trandoshan cameraman Lug. On their first day of broadcasting, Tracene interviewed the New Republic public relations representative Olia Choko and captured footage of her confrontation with Geeska Dotalo and Corporal Camerand Argell's forced parade of Imperial prisoners.
